info.title: ASC API
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Exposes all available operations for discovery purposes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The location of the responsible ASC of the specific subscription. For each subscription there is only one responsible location. The location in the response should be used to read or write other resources in ASC according to their ID.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Short constant description of the error

message.description: Detailed description of the error and resolution suggestions

Kind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind

Location.description: Describes an Azure resource with location

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

OperationList.description: List of possible operations for Microsoft.Security resource provider

Operation.description: Possible operation in the REST API of Microsoft.Security

provider.description: The resource provider for the operation.

resource.description: The display name of the resource the operation applies to.

operation.description: The display name of the security operation.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

Task.description: Security task that we recommend to do in order to strengthen security

state.description: State of the task (Active, Resolved etc.)

creationTimeUtc.description: The time this task was discovered in UTC

SecurityTaskParameters.description: Changing set of properties, depending on the task type that is derived from the name field

AscLocationList.description: List of locations where ASC saves your data

AscLocation.description: The ASC location of the subscription is in the "name" field

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

state.description: State of the alert (Active, Dismissed etc.)

reportedTimeUtc.description: The time the incident was reported to Microsoft.Security in UTC

vendorName.description: Name of the vendor that discovered the incident

alertDisplayName.description: Display name of the alert type

detectedTimeUtc.description: The time the incident was detected by the vendor

description.description: Description of the incident and what it means

remediationSteps.description: Recommended steps to reradiate the incident

actionTaken.description: The action that was taken as a response to the alert (Active, Blocked etc.)

compromisedEntity.description: The entity that the incident happened on

associatedResource.description: Azure resource ID of the associated resource

systemSource.description: The type of the alerted resource (Azure, Non-Azure)

AlertExtendedProperties.description: Changing set of properties depending on the alert type.

securityFamily.description: The security family of the discovered solution

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the Just-in-Time policy.

id.description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.description: Port configurations for the virtual machine

maxRequestAccessDuration.description: Maximum duration requests can be made for. In ISO 8601 duration format. Minimum 5 minutes, maximum 1 day

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the request in UTC

requestor.description: The identity of the person who made the request

id.description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.description: The ports that were opened for the virtual machine

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.description: The IP address range that the port was opened for

endTimeUtc.description: The date & time at which the request ends in UTC

statusReason.description: A description of why the `status` has its value

virtualMachines.description: A list of virtual machines & ports to open access for

id.description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.description: The ports to open for the resource with the `id`

endTimeUtc.description: The time to close the request in UTC

ExternalSecuritySolution.description: Represents a security solution external to Azure Security Center which sends information to an OMS workspace and whos data is displayed by Azure Security Center.

CefExternalSecuritySolution.description: Represents a security solution which sends CEF logs to an OMS workspace

AtaExternalSecuritySolution.description: Represents an ATA security solution which sends logs to an OMS workspace

AadExternalSecuritySolution.description: Represents an AAD identity protection solution which sends logs to an OMS workspace.

ExternalSecuritySolutionKind.description: The kind of the external solution

ExternalSecuritySolutionProperties.description: The solution properties (correspond to the solution kind)

ConnectedWorkspace.title: Represents an OMS workspace to which the solution is connected

id.description: Azure resource ID of the connected OMS workspace

AadConnectivityState.title: The connectivity state of the external AAD solution

AadSolutionProperties.title: The external security solution properties for AAD solutions

CefSolutionProperties.title: The external security solution properties for CEF solutions

AtaSolutionProperties.title: The external security solution properties for ATA solutions

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

AscLocation.name: ascLocation
AscLocation.description: The location where ASC stores the data of the subscription. can be retrieved from Get locations

ExtendedResourceProvider.name: extendedResourceProvider
ExtendedResourceProvider.description: Resource provider name of the base resource

ExtendedResourceName.name: extendedResourceName
ExtendedResourceName.description: The name of the base resource

TaskName.name: taskName
TaskName.description: Name of the task object, will be a GUID

TaskUpdateActionType.name: taskUpdateActionType
TaskUpdateActionType.description: Type of the action to do on the task

AlertUpdateActionType.name: alertUpdateActionType
AlertUpdateActionType.description: Type of the action to do on the alert

DiscoveredSecuritySolutionName.name: discoveredSecuritySolutionName
DiscoveredSecuritySolutionName.description: Name of a discovered security solution.

JitNetworkAccessPolicyName.name: jitNetworkAccessPolicyName
JitNetworkAccessPolicyName.description: Name of a Just-in-Time access configuration policy.

JitNetworkAccessPolicyActionType.name: jitNetworkAccessPolicyActionType
JitNetworkAccessPolicyActionType.description: Type of the action to do on the Just-in-Time access policy.

ExternalSecuritySolutionsName.name: externalSecuritySolutionsName
ExternalSecuritySolutionsName.description: Name of an external security solution.
